Textoffset: Say, this person could be a faerie. Don't you think?
Ummm... What are you supposed to do when you meet people for the first time, again?
I'm Mousseline. Nice to meet you.
Hellooo? I'm here too! My name is Baashear.
I see. ..主人公.. and Baashear. Where did you come from, and what brings you here?
We've come from the Sanctuary of Mana. And we're on a mission from the Mana Goddess to find the Mana Sword—a sword that can save the world!
But we're thinking that in order to get the sword, we'll need some help from a faerie. Which brings us here.
I don't really get it? But...sounds like you need to talk to my friends.
Okay, just follow me. I know the way out.
And doesn't it kind of seem like we've been walking in circles?
I KNEW IT! We were just here moments ago!
Yes! We have! Look! We're literally retracing our own footsteps!
Everyone okay? What was THAT all about, anyway?
So you're being chased by this guy, and he doesn't want you to have the Sword of Mana. Does that mean he wants it? Or...
I've seen a lot of guys like that before. And they are always up to no good.
But surely you wanna know right? I mean, he is kind of trying to kill you. And with no good reason, I bet.
Welcome back, ..主人公... Hard at work, I see?
I see... The way you left that echo may sound disappointing...
But do not fret. It only means that the sword that lies there was not the one we seek. That is all.
And have you noticed? The things you see and hear... Your experiences from these memories are becoming your power.
Threads of unawakened visions will soon weave together one by one and become a sure path, leading you to the Mana Sword.
So do not worry, my precious child. My hope for our world.
Now go! Search for your sword and your faerie. They are both waiting for you to find them in a memory...
(I felt like I could see it in my mind... A vision of a shimmering faerie.)
Hawkeye! ..主人公..! Look! Just beyond the clouds!
Well, wouldja look at that! The gate to the sanctum! The Sword of Mana should be in there.
..主人公..... Can you hear me? I am Faerie, a familiar to the Mana Goddess in this world.
To put it bluntly, the Sanctuary of Mana rejects you.
You are not of this world, and thus cannot be.
Return to your world. The sword you seek here is not meant for you.
The memory of the echo was etched deep into ..主人公...
You look like you're having a good day. What's up?
Go study magic? Nah. I mean, you're welcome to, but now that José's not around, a girls gotta go out and live her life, you know?
Yeah, there was the whole thing with the Crimson Wizard. I mean, there's not much to say, but you-know-who is still not quite over it.
You would not believe how amazing it felt to finally use magic. Living up to all those expectations? Oh yeah. That's the stuff.
You know I'm a princess, right? I'm not the type to flaunt their status, but would it kill you to let me get my way every once in a while?
So much about this place is just... I dunno... 'different.' Not at all like Altena, that's for sure.
I don't really have anything to say at the moment. Okay, actually, wait. Do I talk too much? I feel like I've been talking, like, A LOT.
We all have trials we gotta face someday. That's just life. You just gotta remember 'we' includes you, too.
I feel like you're doing all the heavy lifting in this relationship. If you need me to do something, all you gotta do is ask, okay?
I dunno, is it just me, or are we totally soulmates? ...On the battlefield, I mean!
I...should have probably prepared better for this.
Come on, bro. Now's not the time to be moping around!
Did you see all the other fighters, though!?
And you call yourself a lackey. Hmph. Get it together, already!
Hey, ..主人公..! Can you please talk some sense into this guy?
I mean, I get it. Sitting here moaning about it won't help, but...
Run? Do you even know what Primm would do to us if we did that? There's just no way...
Sooo, then let's get to training! We're not winning this any other way.
Okay, so I've been whipping around this weapon a while now, and I don't feel even the slightest bit stronger. What gives?
Yeah... To be honest, I'm not even sure we're doing this whole training thing right at all. Don't think ..主人公.. does either.
How bout you, Popoi? Any ideas?
Nope! Remember? I got the whole amnesia thing. Barely remember what we had for breakfast.
Right... Well, then what are we supposed to do?
Yo! Mind if I join you guys? Could use a sparring partner!
Aha! I had a feeling you'd be able to block that.
Hey! That's my lackey you're attackin', mister! Er, wait a second. Aren't you the favorite to win this thing?
Okay, Duran. What's the big deal? We do something to offend you?
I was just thinking about how boring this tournament was gonna be, until I saw you guys. Looked like you were having fun so I came over to say hi.
So that's what that was. Yeaaah... You're gonna have to do a bit more than swinging your weapons around.
Imagine how easy it'd be if you could get stronger just by panicking? 'Fraid it's gonna take more than that though.
Truth is, we have no idea how training works, or how to train, really.
Well then, let me help! You gotta fight if you wanna get better at fighting! So come on, gimme your best shot.
That's it? You couldn't even outfight a rabite with stamina like that.
Now, I'll admit, you've got some talent—you just gotta figure out a way to harness it! You gotta go all out, you know?
Go all out!? I can't even move right now.
All right, then tell me this. Why do you wanna get stronger? You're never gonna get stronger if you don't have a reason!
You go first. Why do you want to get stronger?
Me? I'm chasin' after my old man. He was a knight of great renown, and I wanna be even greater than he was.
I'm sure you all have your own reasons. You gotta hold on to that. Let it inspire you.
Sorry, didn't mean to turn this into a lecture, and I guess I should be heading back anyway. See you at the finals, eh?
'SeE YoU aT ThE FiNalS', he says! If he doesn't lose before he gets there, that is!
Okay folks! New orders—beat that guy and make him my new lackey!
He did go out of his way to train us. It'd be almost rude if we didn't beat him, right?
(I don't have that reason just yet, Duran. But for now, I just gotta give it all I got!)
Wanna make a run for it?
BAAASHEAR! And that guy with the funky hair must be...
BAAASHEAR! And that girl with the amazing pigtails must be...
Ah, a friend of few words. Better than a certain loud-mouth we all know and love...
Wow, that is a great question!
Huh. I didn't even think to wonder until you asked. But how exactly did we get here?
Let's see... ..主人公.. is about to go on an adventure, and came to bring us along!
That STILL doesn't tell us where we are! Or how we got here!
So, I've got a theory. Hear me out...
You were wishing with all your heart that these two could join us...and here they are.
WAIT! If you can do that with people, can you do that with things? Hurry up and wish for the Mana Sword!

I see the conviction in your face!
...But it's not working.
Hey! Take this seriously! I can tell you're not thinking of the Mana Sword—it's written all over your face!
Alas, I guess it's hard to think of something you've never actually seen.
Quite the pickle, eh? Those two have no idea where we are, we have no idea where we are, and none of us know where to go looking for clues!
Hey, we were teleported here just like you. It's not our fault we're lost!
For someone who's on an important mission from the goddess, you sure do seem to be in the dark about what you're supposed to do.
Baa! Of course I am! I've never had to find a Mana Sword sword before!
How do you even find a Mana Sword? Not like there's a big red sign that says 'Here be Mana Swords' or something.
Oh my gosh, Honeycomb! I am sorta-kinda pretty sure we totally know this place!
I can almost guarantee we don't.

No! Look! The cotton candy flowers, the chill in the air...
And see that lake off in the distance?
Oh! You're right. That must be...Lake Riyama!
The Mana Sword you're looking for is in that lake, for sure! I've read the story enough times to know!
Well, at least someone is having fun.
I'm not exactly sure what the two of you are talking about, but...
If there are still legends about the sword, we may be in the right place after all.

But surely we will find the Mana Sword this time!
Give it your all, ..主人公...
Adventuring with those two is bad for my nerves, so I'll just stay out of the way.
C'mon ..主人公.. and Baashear! Let's go! Good ol' Duffle will lead the way!
(Aha! So that's what all the gloom and glum was about. You wanted to see these two again!)
(You can't fool me, ..主人公... You might not admit it, but I see that goofy smile on your face! You wanted to see these two again!)
Looks like you're starting to get used to being dropped in the middle of nowhere, eh?

Now, where are we this time?
From the looks of it...
By the look on your face, I guess you've never read about it.
It's where the best part of the Legend of the Mana Tree takes place. For in the center of the lake, deep within the ruins lies the mystical sword...
As if called there, the Mana Swordsman arrives to free the sword from its slab—a feat that no one had ever achieved!
So first we had our little monster bash...
And now we're on a legit quest! For the Mana Sword! I dunno about you guys, but I'm pumped!
We should do our special trio thing! Okay guys get those poses ready!
Come on! I expected as much from Honeycomb, but I thought you'd join me at least!
Aw yeah! I knew you'd be down! We gotta work on the timing, but I'll take it!
It was bad enough when it was just a victory pose...
All right, folks! The moment you've all been waiting for. Let the All-Valsena Tournament of Champions BEGIN!
Oooh! I shoulda known bro was gonna go to bat with my chakrams...
Looks like from the first round, Popoi and Duffle are out.
Hey, I might be out, but I put up a good fight. How'd you do, Duffle?
So I charged in, looking to end it early, you know? And I kinda, uh, ran too far and stepped out of bounds.
Yeah, you could say that. Hehe!
Looks like Duran won his match. And if he keeps winning, looks like he'll be my opponent in the semis.
IF you can beat me, Randi. 'IF.'
We better focus on this Duran guy. Those brats won't be any trouble.
And that's it folks! The ref has called it. Your winner is...Randi!
Oh? What's this? We've got a flag on the field! And the ref is saying Honeycomb is disqualified for using magic!
All right, I'm ready to go! Who am I up against?
And I'm not losin' to my own lackey, magic or no!
And I won't hold back either.
You're not bad with that weapon of yours, bro. But it ain't gonna do you much good if you can't get in close enough to use it!
Come on, bro! You're gonna have to do more than just dodge the whole time!
Ngh... I can't keep this up for much longer.
You know what they say—if ya can't dodge it, swat it!
Hey hey, now! Come on and bring it!
Take that! And that! Ready to give up yet, Randi!?
(Man, I can't get close enough to attack! She's too good, and too fast!)
You can't win if you don't attack!
I can't let her get the best of me!
Pride's a little hurt, but fine otherwise. When did you get so good at this, Randi?
I mean, you beat me? Have some confidence, man!
Looks like Randi won his match. That means we're up next!
You sure talk a big game for someone with such little experience!
Hmph. I might not be able to use magic, but don't think for a second, I'll go down easy!
Besides. I've seen you fight plenty enough to know I can win this. En garde!
Huh... You're pretty nimble. I'll give you that! But don't think you'll win so easily!
Huh!? Wait! That was a mistake! I didn't mean—
Yeah, and if I had been able to use magic, then I definitely would have won!
And now that you've beat me, you better make it to the top!
There's still a bit of time before the next fight, so how about a little warm-up before go time?
Ever heard my brother play the harp? He's pretty good, so if ya haven't, you should!
Wanna go on a date? Now look at that, you look redder than an apple. D'ya think I was serious?
Time goes by reeeal slow here. The kinda slow you wish you were spendin' with somebody else, ya know what I mean?
Might not look it, but I'm pretty handy with a knife. It's the only weapon I use, after all.
Don't like talkin' 'bout the past, if I'm bein' honest. Ain't a lot of good memories back there.
Seen a lot of places over the years, and I gotta say, this town sure is unique. I mean that in a good way, by the by.
Favorite food? Well I ain't had a whole lot to begin with, so I guess you could say they're all my favorite.
Take me on your next adventure, will ya? Don't worry, I can hold my own.
You seen Sumo around? Fine if ya haven't. Just askin' is all.
You have just experienced the true power of the mana fruit! Quite impressive, is it not?
The world you see before you is the memory of a place locked within the mana fruit!
The Mana Goddess says these memories are called 'echoes.' It'd be smart to remember that, child of man.
That said, I'm not exactly familiar with the echo we are currently in...
I can say for sure we're in a town, and that we're not in danger. I'd wager a coat on it!

I've never seen such fearsome creatures!
..主人公.., make quick work of them, won't you?
I knew I could count on you! Now let's see what you can do!
What do you think that weapon on your back is for? Go on! Steel thyself! Show those monsters who's boss!
Egad! How do you expect to put fear in the hearts of monsters with a measly stick like THAT!?
...You've only ever fought in your dreams, you say?
My goddess... I'm afraid our journey is at an end before it's even began!
Those little guys didn't hurt ya did they? Well don't you worry one bit, I'm here to save the day!
Save the day? Not when your guard is THAT wide open.
Oh! Hey! Good looking out, Honeycomb!
Maybe focus a little more on the monsters, eh? What are they even doing here in the middle of town, anyway?
Huh, that is weird, isn't it? I don't think I've ever seen them come into town like this before.
But, as long as we're around to protect the peace, what's a few monsters?
Easier said than done. It's not like we have any practical battle experience.
Honeycomb! It'll be fine! Seriously, between the three of us, it'll be easy peasy lemon squeezy!
Speaking of which! Hey, you with the stick! What's your name?

Okay, ..主人公..!
Glad to meet ya!
Hm? Something the matter, child of man? You can tell me! I'm not just a guide, I'm a confidante as well, you know!
A sheep must journey with companions of the highest quality and stature! So, uh, how about we go on an adventure?
Surely by now you understand the importance of the Mana Tree! You do? That's the spirit! Now, off we go!
The Faeriewood has long been spellbound to easily lose your way. So I'm not surprised you've found yourselves wandering in circles.
Part of the idea was to keep random folks from just popping in, you know? But another part of it might've been to have a little fun playing tricks.
But since the forest started changing, we faeries had to make landmarks to keep ourselves from getting lost. Ironic, huh? Faeries lost in their own Faeriewood.
Anywho, as long as you know the secret, it's easy peasy, so allow me to break it down for you.
Start from Luna, then Salamando, Undine, Dryad, Sylphid, and Gnome...
Just follow the landmarks in the same order. Like moon, fire, water, wood, and wind. Got it?
Heh. That's my ..主人公..! Keep that in your noggin and you can come visit faeries anytime.
Heh, let me make it easy for you. It's like the elements for the days of the week. You know the days of the week, don't you?
But it's alright if you don't remember. I bet once you see them, you'll pick it up easy.
By the way, not every place has a landmark.
Isn't that interesting? If you ever find a place like that, we should check it out together!
Say, uh... I've got something I'm curious about.
Why must you always stand so close!?
Y-Yes, I mean, you're basically on top of ..主人公..! Right, ..主人公..? It's odd, don't you agree?
Right!? Too close for comfort! Just looking at you two makes my wool itch!
A little weird? But I don't mean any harm...
Either way, let's get this party started, eh? Try to keep up!
Oh, and just a thing that came to mind, but doesn't Honeycomb have wings that kind of look like the ones these faeries have?
I thought that may be the case. But why would he do that?
Honeycomb? A faerie? I sincerely doubt it. I mean, maybe. I suppose stranger things have happened.
This Honeycomb wouldn't happen to be a sorcerer, would he? I've seen some sorcerer outfits that are like that. This was ages ago, though.
When humans were first starting to get into faerie magic, they would dress up like us, and I guess it just stuck?
I mean who wouldn't want wings? I think it's cute, to be honest.
I bet your friend would freak out if he met me.
Okay, so then where is this faerie you speak of anyway, mister?
Now that you mention it...I haven't seen her in a while...
That's so like her, too. Give me all this responsibility, and then only show up when it's convenient.
But it doesn't matter. I need the sword to break the curse that was put on my good friend's sister. I won't stop till I find it.
And when I do that, the sword is yours! You're on a mission too, right?
I won’t be here for long. A ninja must always be on the move.
Surely this is fate. Help us and I'll teach you my skills.
A ninja must forgo the light and live in shadow. It is our way. The mission always comes first.
I won't reveal my identity for no good reason...
The best information is worth its weight in gold.
One might find peace with the comfort this place provides, but to a Nevarl ninja, comfort only breeds anxiety.
Our skills take countless hours of practice to master. You can't just learn them overnight.
As a token of our friendship, I betroth onto you this Nevarl ninja garb... Mm? You don't want it?
You know what? From now on, all your ninja related needs are half off. I call it the shinobi sidekick discount!
Ever heard of artifacts? They can look like just about anything!
Being swift and nimble has always come easy for me.
I'm pretty good at mastering all sorts of weapons in little to no time.
Something about this place just puts me at ease. As if I were home in my own village.
I bet the orchard's bearing fruit right about now...
So do you have a workshop around here? Let me know and I'll get our gear tempered to tip-top shape!
I can play a pretty mean harp, you know. No fooling!
These coins? Yeah, I think they look neat too! And they're etched with the images of elemental spirits, see?
We'd better go and tell Li'l Cactus what we got up to today.
I left Bud and Lisa to keep watch back home, but I wonder how they're doing...
Bam! That was almost too easy!
Sorry, were we in two different battles? I couldn't tell if our friend here was fighting or juggling!
Harsh much, Honeycomb!? I think we make a pretty good team, actually!

Right!?
See, ..主人公.. thinks so too, Honeycomb.

See? Even ..主人公.. agrees.
Two versus one, and the nays have it, Duffle.
Bravo, children of man! You really did a number on those things! When I saw ..主人公.. get all weak-kneed, I thought we were done for...
And then I was so scared I could hardly move.
You said something about monsters not showing up around here, right? That might be due to a unique quirk with echoes.
Echoes are merely worlds built from a memory, after all.
And no memory is perfect, right? So it's only natural for a few anomalies to pop up here and there.
So it's quite natural for things to be slightly out of sort.
I mean, we're a good example of that, if you think about it! Us being here is just one of many types of echo anomalies.
My point is that this likely isn't a one-off thing. So whatever happens on our journey, let's just keep our cool and be careful!
What is THAT!? It's like a stuffed animal, but...it makes words with its mouth?
How rude! I'm Baashear! And I'm a sheep, thank you very much!
...But I don't think I've seen a sheep that can hover in midair before. How does that work exactly? Looks like some sophisticated magic.
In fact, I've never seen magic on a level like this... Just who are you, anyway, ..主人公..?
Yeah! You're definitely not from around here, I bet! Where ya from, ..主人公..?
What? Do you think we're stupid?
We don't know! That's why I asked!
Hold on. Could you mean that you don't know where you came from and you don't know where you are now?

No way, ..主人公..!
You mean you have amnesia? Thaaaat's...nooot goood?
Well, let's start with the basics. This place is called Pinzton. It's our home!
It might seem a little small, but it's on the main road. We get all sorts of visitors.
So I doubt anyone would bat an eye at the thought of having an amnesiac in town!
I know! How about we show you around?
You might feel a bit better once you get your bearings. Come on! Let's go!
Pardon me, child of man, but we're not here for sightseeing. We are on an important task you see, and—

You coming or what?
..主人公.. is quite a bit ahead already.

Oh dear!
Wait for me, ..主人公..!
I think you may be right!
I'm not so sure about that...
Ow! You know, it would have nice to have been warned about this whole falling through the air part!
It's not an adventure if there aren't any surprises, Honeycomb!
Well waddaya know folks! Straight from, well, the sky, we've got ourselves some last minute contenders for this year's tournament!
Wise-guys, eh? You've just entered yourselves into the All-Valsena Tournament of Champions. A contest to see who's the baddest warrior in all the plains!
You heard me right, kiddo! Gotta say, fallin' from the sky was quite the entrance! Are you as excited as I am, folks? Let's hear it!
Wonderful, just wonderful! Now that we have all our entries, let the All-Valsena Tournament of Champions begin!
You know, I didn't know what to expect, but I'd never guess we'd end up in a fighting tournament.
And what's wrong with that? We're knights, fighting's what we do! Perfect chance for us to test our might.
Does your optimism know no end?
Eyyy, I was wondering who that was fallin' out the sky. What an entrance, guys. I sure do have the best lackeys.
I certainly do not remember ever becoming your lackey. Hey, ..主人公.., do you know these people?
Geheh! I always knew you were a smart one, lackey number three!
You gotta be kidding me! Everyone knows Popoi around here. You guys some kinda moles or somethin'?
What? No! This is just our first time meeting you, is all. See, Baashear? Meeting new people already!
Hah! Well at any rate, we should introduce ourselves. I'm Randi. Nice to meet you!
And I'm Popoi, the faerie! Bet you thought I was just normal human, eh?
And I'm Primm. Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you guys! I'm Duffle, and this is Honeycomb. And ..主人公.. here is how we got here in the first place!
Well, I'm always happy to make new friends. I think I saw how you got here, heh, but what brings you to the tournament?
Just kinda ended up here. How about you guys?
The three of us have been adventuring together, and the foes we face keep getting stronger and stronger...
And so we figured what better way to prepare ourselves for the road ahead than joining a tournament?
Yeah, and if we win, my little group of lackeys might just grow into a full posse! Oh, and there's a prize, too.
But, yeah, I'm not sure we have much of a chance. Everyone else looks way tougher than we do.
See that guy over there? The one with the hair, swingin' his sword around? That guy.
Wow, well at least one of us is confident! I figured you had some skills, but look at the guy over there swinging his sword. The one with the hair.
Wow, that was amazing! His swings are so fast I can barely keep up!
That guy's the favorite to win. He doesn't look so tough to me, though!
Gehah! After I hit 'em with my magic he's gonna wish he never picked up a sword!
A fellow sorcerer, eh? We'll see whose magic brings him to his knees.
Ah, so, about that. Magic is banned from the tournament. Hand to hand only.
What? If I can't use my magic, how can I fight?
We'll figure something out! Besides, it's way more fun if you fight at a disadvantage, right? Really gets the blood pumping!
Couldn't have said it better! Why don't we go over there and talk battle plans?
Great idea! See you guys later!
I should probably start thinking of ideas myself. If we end up being put against each other, don't think for a second that I'll go easy!

And then there were three...
It's neat to see everyone so pumped. What should we do then?
Yeah, bro. In times like this, there's only one thing to do. Train our butts off.
So there was A sword, but not THE sword?
How will you know when you've found the right one? Do you feel it in your bones or something?
So there was A sword, but not THE sword?
How will you know when you've found the right one? Do you feel it in your bones or something?
The search for the Mana Sword seems to be moving along quite well.
Is it? They found the wrong Mana Sword.
The goal is to find the Sword, yes, but the things you learn and the people you meet are an important piece of the puzzle.
All shall guide ..主人公.. to the Mana Sword in time.
Is it? They found the wrong Mana Sword.
The goal is to find the Sword, yes, but the things you learn and the people you meet are an important piece of the puzzle.
All shall guide ..主人公.. to the Mana Sword in time.
If only I had enough power left... I could end the search in a flash. Alas...
The Mana Tree is connected to the memories of all realms. But in my weakened state, I can but see glimpses of these memories.
The mana fruit themselves are formed from mere pieces of fabric stitched together. A collage of half-remembrances...
But the memory is out there somewhere. It may not be the next fruit, but eventually what we seek will appear.
The path to it may be long and winding, but please...do not give up.
The Mana Goddess has gone... It seems she can never talk for very long.
I wish I could hear more though from her and from you, ..主人公... I'd even like to hear more about Randi and Primm and Popoi's journey.
You know, when you join up with Honeycomb and Duffle, you become a trio just like Randi and his friends. Funny, huh?
I wouldn't mind hearing more stories about the two of them! Whatever they're up to, I bet it'll be fun!
Fun!? I do not call getting kidnapped by monsters or being chased around by a scary knight fun! It was a nightmare, in fact!
On top of that, it was a total waste of time. They didn't even have the Mana Sword.
Besides! What we gained from our last adventure was considerably more valuable to us with regards to actually reaching our goal.
Yes, I know, they didn't have the sword we wanted, but at least it was actually related to the Mana Sword!
Anywho, I'm sure we'll find the right one on our next go around.
..主人公.., the Mana Tree is bearing new fruit! Let's get a move on, shall we?
Hey! What's the hold up, ..主人公..?
Was it something I said? About your friends? I don't blame you for wanting to be with them.
That gloomy face won't work with me! So chin up, buttercup! It's time to go!
The Mana Goddess has gone... It seems she can never talk for very long.
I wish I could hear more though from her and from you, ..主人公... I'd even like to hear more about Randi and Primm and Popoi's journey.
You know, when you join up with Honeycomb and Duffle, you become a trio just like Randi and his friends. Funny, huh?
I wouldn't mind hearing more stories about the two of them! Whatever they're up to, I bet it'll be fun!
Fun!? I do not call getting kidnapped by monsters or being chased around by a scary knight fun! It was a nightmare, in fact!
On top of that, it was a total waste of time. They didn't even have the Mana Sword.
Besides! What we gained from our last adventure was considerably more valuable to us with regards to actually reaching our goal.
Yes, I know, they didn't have the sword we wanted, but at least it was actually related to the Mana Sword!
Anywho, I'm sure we'll find the right one on our next go around.
..主人公.., the Mana Tree is bearing new fruit! Let's get a move on, shall we?
Hey! What's the hold up, ..主人公..?
Was it something I said? About your friends? I don't blame you for wanting to be with them.
That gloomy face won't work with me! So chin up, buttercup! It's time to go!
(I felt like I could see it in my mind... A vision of the first Mana Sword I'd laid eyes on...)
The memory of the echo was etched deep into ..主人公...

At any rate, we're not just trying to become some knights of legend. We're training to some day do what REAL knights do.
It's not like we actually think the Mana Sword or the mana knights from that story exist. It's only a tale—and a tall one at that.
Baahaha! You poor, naive little children of man!
All right. Listen up, you two! The Mana Sword and the Mana Swordsman aren't some made up plots from a fairytale!

Get ready for the truth.
..主人公.. is—
Whoa! Those monsters are back! Or should I say, their friends are...

Well they don't look like they're OUR friends!
..主人公..! Help! This ram's in a jam!
Don't just stand there thinking! Get over here and help me!
No, I'm most certainly not! I'm scared sheepless!
Oh! Were we supposed to do something about that?
Right! We've gotta save your buddy! The chase is on!
Found him! And that's...a lot of monsters.
Where did they all come from!? The've got him trapped just by sheer numbers!
Maybe they saw a giant ball of wool and thought to make a nest.

That would spell bad news for the town if they did.
Let's make quick work of them!
Wait. Taking on this many all at once is a bad idea.
Don't forget the ones back in town. Maybe we should take care of them first?
Ready everyone? Time to put your game faces on.
Er, I mean, Operation Baashear Breakout begins!
Lady Moti's not much of a talker, but her selection is second to none! She's got basically everything!
Lady Moti here is from a clan of merchants. You can tell 'cause everyone in the clan does this weird dance all the time.
It is a normal dance, thank you.
See, I expected you to be quiet. You've barely said anything since the moment we met!
But I have no idea why Honeycomb, the guy that prides himself in always getting the last word, always clams up the moment we step in here.
Maybe it's 'cause he has the hots for Lady Moti? Eh?
Clam up? I think not! You just talk so much it's hard to get a word in edgewise! Now let's get what we need and go!
Good to see ya! What'cha up to today? Another pretend patrol, is it?
'Pretend?' It's not pretend! We're protecting the town. For real!
Come on, Duffle. Show a little more respect.
Watts may look young, but he's much older than we are. Dwarfs just age different than we do.
Gahaha! It'd take a lot more than a little back talk to make me mad! Always the serious one, aren'cha?
So, what can I do ya for? Sword need sharpenin'? Shield need shinin'? Wand need a waxin'?
Nope! We're showing our new friend around town!
And we were wondering if you had any equipment that might be a good fit for our pal.
New around here, eh? What'cha got there then, a stick?
Hah! A stick! I mean, it's a little more ornate than a stick, but it's totally a stick! If ya had to put a name on it though, I guess you could call it a staff?
Mmmm... Not quite a staff either. I don't really know what to call it.
Yeah, it honestly might not be a weapon at all! Kinda looks like what you'd use to pluck fruit from a tree?
Brought a gardenin' tool to the battlefield, didja now? Funniest thing I've heard all day, you guys.
How 'bout let's get'cha somethin' nicer, eh? How's this for ya?
Uffda! Kids these days, I tell ya. Could knock 'em over with a summer breeze! You sure you're eating enough, there?
Well, hey. No need to change things up if you're happy with the stuff you had, right?
Yeah, I suppose. I guess I stuck my nose where it didn't belong.
Well, if ya change your mind, feel free to stop on by any time! I'll fix ya up somethin' real nice, you bet'cha!
Pardon me. Couldn't quite hold back that sneeze... Heheh.
(What did I do to deserve this? Hurry up and rescue me already, ..主人公..!)
...You shall not have the Mana Sword. And I will do everything I can to see to that.
I know you're out there listening... I...will..stop you...
Surrounded by nature, and perfect weather to boot. Quite the place you got here.
I've traveled the world over, and I've seen a lot of places. So I know the good and the bad. And here, it's good.
I am afraid the years have not been the kindest to the ol' stomach region. Used to be solid muscle, now...not so much.
Been to a lot of countries in my time. Remember a beautiful one, lush greens all around. And oh, there was one with a castle made entirely out of ice, too.
I much prefer going on adventures to merchant work.
Now this here harmonica is very important to me. Lot of sentimental value, you see.
Don't have a shop, I just wander wherever the wind takes me.
You seem like an experienced adventurer. Mind if I join ya next time?
I'm a bit of an oddball in the Niccolo community. Or so I've been told.
Ever heard of an island called Illusia? I love it there, and I'd say I love being here almost just the same.
Do I look all right to you!? Are YOU all right?
Took the words out of my mouth! I did kinda say 'MAAAKE WAAAYYY' though, so you can't say I didn't warn ya.
Now where am I? And how'd I end up here?
Weird. Can't remember how I got here...
But if I fell from the sky... Yeah, you know what? I bet the Cannon Man messed somethin' up.
You see, a 'man' puts you in a 'cannon', and then BOOM! You're blastin' off to wherever it is you need to go.
It's handy for sure. But the aim is...well, it ain't the best, so sometimes you kinda just end up somewhere else.
You see, a 'man' puts you in a 'cannon', and then BOOM! You're blastin' off to wherever it is you need to go.
It's great, when it works. But it, uh, looks like this time they kinda missed the mark. That happens.
And yeah, I don't see my bro and sis around, so I guess I need to go look for them.
Good grief. Lackeys need to be with their boss at all times! Who do they think they are?
Hey you, with the funky hair! You can call me Popoi.
Hey you, with the crazy pigtails! You can call me Popoi.

..主人公..!
Okie doke, today's your lucky day. I'm in need of a new lackey, and you're at the top of my list.
'Ehhh?' Well, it doesn't matter what you say. You're already hired!
Ah, that's the spirit. I knew you'd be all in!
(Heavens to mana! We have no time to be playing lackey!)
(We're supposed to be looking for the Mana Sword...)
What are you dilly-dallying for? Not my fault if you get lost, lackey!
(Bah! They're right. Maybe it'd be best if we follow them until they find their friends, at least.)
Yes... Now where are we this time? I see a lot of trees... Hmmm...
Aha! I've got it! This must be...
A forest! Yes. We have landed in a forest.
Hm? Did you hear that? I don't like the way that sound...sounded, which means...
It's time to hide! Good luck!
Hmph. I wouldn't call that a warm welcome.
You seem to be alright, but neither of us can take much more a beating.

..主人公.....
Now is the time to unleash your power.
Let's see now... You should be just about used to questing in your journey. So it's time to get you up to speed with mana boards!
Wait, this isn't a gusthall! What's going on here?
Oh yeah, pretty sure I remember this place. In fact, it looks just like the place where I met the light spirit, Cascade Cavern.
Be on your guard everyone. We're in enemy territory.
Yup, I was right! It's a fullmetal hugger!
Hey, look over there. You see what I see, sticking out of that rock?
But, why's it there? I thought Bro already pulled it out.
Thank goodness you're safe! Don't make me worry like that again.
Randi, blink twice if you can hear me!
You don't think he hit his head on the way down, do you?
Oh, NOW you speak. What's up with the silent treatment?
Silent? Sorry, I don't know what you're talking about.
Oh, right! Our friend here wants to take a look at your Mana Sword.
Could you sound any more sketchy? Bro, don't listen to that excuse! It's definitely more than just a look!
Hey, that's Randi's prized possession we're talking about. We're gonna need a full explanation before he hands it over.
Oh. But I already, uhhh, yeah.
Baahaha! Never doubt a sheep's intuition!
We did it, Goddess! We found the Mana Sword!
Hmph. Looks like the Mana Sword we need isn't in this echo after all.
But just seeing a real Mana Sword is a big deal! Just take a look around.
The sheer brilliance of the Mana Sword has perfectly righted a echo riddled with chaos!
A wonder, indeed! It's not hard to see how the Mana Sword is the answer to saving our realm.
Good goddess! My wool's just itching to get our Mana Sword, ..主人公..! Don't you agree?
Pay no attention to the floating sheep!
What a weird and fluffy little thing! So are you, like, a talking monster? Or a ghost?
One thing I can say for sure, though, is that you're definitely not a sheep.
Okay, but how is it moving? Is there something inside it?
S-Stop that right this instant! Quit pulling at me! This body is goddess-made! A super rare item!
I'm not sure I fully get what's going on here, but...
You're from another world, and you came here looking for the Mana Sword. Is that the gist of it?
Haha! Well, if you say it's that simple, then I guess it must be!
Oh, is there more? Or maybe it's just a case of impostor syndrome? I know the feeling, trust me.
This sword I pulled from the stone basically by accident... If it's what you need to save our world...
Then you deserve to have it more than I do. It's why you came here, and it's too important just to keep to myself.
At least, that's what I thought at first. But it looks like this Mana Sword has chosen me.
Even if it was an accident, I must continue to carry it.
Hah! After all we've been through, why am I suddenly so nervous?

..主人公..!
This echo's a bust. Let's head back! Come on, now!
Hey! The fluff-monster's trying to get away!
Headin' back, eh? Where exactly to?
I see. Off to the next world, is it?
Sounds amazing. I know the road won't be easy, but just remember to never give up, okay?
And while we're making promises, I swear on this Mana Sword that I won't give up either.
See ya later, lackey! Be sure to come visit your boss when you get lonely!
And when you finally get your hands on your very own Mana Sword, come back and show it to us! We'll be waiting!
And here too. Strange... There was never a path leading out here before.

Hey! Wait!
Get back here!
Tch... Was it something I said!?

Hey Riesz. Wait, ..主人公..!?
What are you doing here?
This is the man I spoke of earlier—the one in search of the Mana Sword. I had no idea you had already met...
Even I didn't know that! Where did you meet anyway?
What do you mean 'dream'? You looked perfectly awake when you were helping me fight my way out of that dungeon!
Seriously!? You're telling me you don't remember helping me fight my way out of a dungeon?
I tease, but if we're being honest, I'm having trouble remembering much of the details myself.
Regardless. I'm happy to see you made it out okay.
I see. So you saw this guy in a dream you had before you woke up in the sanctuary, eh?
Hm... In that case, we can say your memory from that time is getting reflected onto this echo.
Which means, he knows you because YOU know him.
Does that make sense? I can't put it any more simply than that.
Now. How did you find yourself teamed up with Riesz?
We actually just ran into each other moments ago! They're looking for the Mana Sword, right ..主人公..?
Mana Sword? You mean the Sword of Mana? Well, I know where it is! It's in the sky!
I'm serious! The sword sleeps in the sanctum, and the gate to that sanctum is, as I said, in the sky. Like, way up in the sky. Above it, even.
And the only way to get there is to enlist the help of the Winged Defender who lives atop the Celestial Peak.
And I found someone I thought may be the Winged Defender here, but turns out he doesn't particularly care for me, so...
He just went and flew up somewhere even higher!
The Winged Defender is the guardian of these mountains. It is said only an Amazon's voice can reach it.
Let us go to the peak together. I shall be your voice.
You'd do that? Talk about the royal treatment! I could kiss you right now!
Ack! Why are you standing so close to me?
Was it something I said? Oh well. Time to move, ..主人公..!
We've made it to the bottom of the waterfall, but I don't see Randi anywhere...
Such a long way to fall...

..主人公..?
Hello? Anyone home? Stop staring into the void and look around for my bro!
Ugh! We don't have time for this now!

But if we gotta fight, then we'll fight.
Look alive, ..主人公..! We gotta take this thing down!
Upgrade mana boards here to boost ally stats! You want your allies to be stronger, don't you?
All you need is upgrade material so... Voila! I got this especially for you!
Nice! Boosting stats makes a difference—and the difference is shear!
Next time you need spirit coins for upgrades, you can get them from playing training dungeons.
Look, Honeycomb! It's a goddess statue!
Why are you telling me? I know what it is—I'm from here. Remember?

Oh, yeah!
Listen, ..主人公... These goddess statues bring special blessings.
That's right. So when you're feeling low in energy, you should take a moment to stop by one.
Hey, you're kind of a natural at this. Not bad for your first fight!
Oh, where are my manners? Thanks for getting me out of that cell. You really saved my bacon back there.
I'm Hawkeye. What should I call you, my sudden savior?
So... I gotta know. Why save someone you've never even met before?

Ow...
Okay, now where are we? How did we even get here?
Uh oh. This looks like bad news!
How about a little less conversation and a little more action? Take this!

Listen up, ..主人公..!
This is the real deal! Give it all you've got and nothing less!
Be purged, before you truly awaken.
I'd just like to keep on adventuring as I always have, but now, with you!
Let me know if there's anything you might want!
Smile! Let the world know you're happy!
The secret to good business is being sincere. Take it from me!
I bought all sorts of things so it's about time to sell it off.
It's too dangerous for folks like us to wander outside town.
If only I could be reborn into a world of cats and rabbits.
If there's anything you want, I'll find it for you!
I bet Bro and Sis are...this way!
That's what my gut is telling me. And it's always right!
Come on, lackey, put some spirit into it! Keep this up and you'll be stuck at 'low-level lackey' forever, you know!
Just my luck though... ALL my lackeys have an attitude. You'd think they'd show their boss a little more respect!
But don't you worry. I'll whip you right into shape!

Gehehe! 'Boss!'
That's right! I think I'm starting to like you.
Especially your attitude! Keep it up!
In fact, calling me 'boss' just one more time could score you some points. Know what I mean?
Speak to me only if it is a matter of importance. I have no time for idle chit chat.
Looks like you found me... Not bad.
You better be ready to pay up if you need our services. We don't work for cheap.
Your skills in stealth are impressive indeed. Might even be better than me!
Have you ever thought about becoming a ninja? I think you'd be pretty good at it.
There are some skills that can only be done when two ninja are uniquely in tune with one another. Something you will never be.
The way of the ninja has no shortcuts!
Flashy magic and giant swords are unnecessary when it comes to burying your target.
Why not add the power of darkness to your arsenal? Just think of the possibilities.
I would teach you my greatest technique if you so asked.
Wonderful! So you got caught in a gusthall, huh?
Oh, don't worry about me, I'm fine. So you got caught in a gusthall, huh?
I am Princess Riesz of Laurent, the Kingdom of Wind. I am on a journey to find my kidnapped little brother.
Now, would you be so kind as to tell me your names?
I am Baashear, and my dazed-looking friend here is ..主人公...
And we're on a journey ourselves! The Mana Goddess gave us a mission to search for the Mana Sword.
Well isn't that peculiar. I met someone else who was in search of the very same thing.
What luck! Do you know where that person is now?
I apologize, but I am afraid I haven't a clue.
Hmmm... That's unfortunate... Looks like we're back to square one on our Mana Sword search.
Perhaps you'd like to come visit my kingdom for a spell? I was just about to make my way back there.
I have some friends who could maybe lend you their help!
I think we should take her up on the offer!
Great! Then let us get going. And be sure to mind the monsters—I can't fight them all on my own!
Goodness! She's a veritable guardian angel.
Finally we find a companion who is truly reliable, and kind to boot!
Kind? Yes. Reliable? Not so much.
Reliable? Those two!? I'll give you kind, but reliable?
But yes, I get the feeling if we stick with Riesz, we'll be safe and sound. Good things are bound to happen, ..主人公..!
What in the name of Mana...
Whoa! First we're outside, now we're inside.
How did we... How we'll ever get used to all these strange echo anomalies, I'll never know.
And look at this odd fellow! His mouth is open like it's about to say something.
HEY! You can't just go around pushing any random button you find! It could be a...
...What was that? It sounded like a scream...
Whoa! What's that mass of spikey fluff flying this way!?
Whoa! What's that mass of wavy fluff flying this way!?
What about Randi and his friends?
So, you mentioned you were searching for your little brother, yes?
I must say, it is rather kind of you to offer us your help in the midst of such an important quest.
The truth is...I received some pertinent information about his whereabouts.
And I'm on my way back to the kingdom with that information in order to enlist the help of our elite Amazon guard.
Our meeting is no accident. And if mana's guidance brought us together, I will ensure we arrive safely.
However, I must admit...something is amiss.
I know this area like the back of my hand...and yet it appears different somehow.
I bet this is another echo anomaly. If this gets any harder to navigate, we'll be in trouble!
It's a little unnerving, but the basic directions should be the same! Let's keep going. Just be sure to keep an eye on which directions the statues blow.
Hmph. More stubborn than I thought.
I get the feeling we're going to have to do it up big if we wanna get rid of these guys for good.
Whaddaya say? Got anything like that in your bag of tricks?
Hm? What's up, you remember something?
All right, well let's get this party started, then!
I just heard an explosion coming from the dungeon! Hurry!
Murder is no laughing matter. Your execution date is being decided.
I suggest you reflect on your crimes while you wait.

It wasn't me. I could never hurt Eagle.
He was my friend.
Save the intros for later, I guess. We better get out of here!
There he is! Thought you could get away, eh?
Tch! Didn't think they'd find us! Guess we've gotta do this the hard way!
What? You don't know how to fight? You gotta be kidding me.
Fine. I'll show you. But you're getting the abridged version!

..主人公.....
The one who shall gather the echoes of Mana...
By the way, where are your friends? Or are you here alone?
What? Like a stuffed animal you can't sleep without? Hm, you need more help than I thought.
Hm... Not sure what that means, but...
Never fear, Boss is here! And as soon as I find my bro and sis, I'll introduce them to you!
So, you'll help me look for them, won't you?
Here's the deal. Bro has this hair that's kinda...kinda like the top of a pineapple, you know? All prickly and stuff.
Sis? Well, she is full-on pink from head to toe.
(Pineapple Boy and Pink Girl? Just what sort of gang is this?)
I have no interest in the weak. Show me power.
A grudge born from cruelty is one not so easily forgotten.
You think you can beat me? With those arms? I'd like to see you try. I don't go easy on the weak.
You're not worthy of being my foe, let alone my underling.
You need not only power, but fear to break a foe's spirit.
Hmph. Not as weak as you once were, it seems.
I cannot express in words the joy I felt when I was named leader...
Kevin is my rival, but one day I will... No, let's not.
When I eventually wear the crown, I will be sure to keep you in my inner circle.
Perhaps it was all plain jealousy... The more I see you all, the clearer it becomes.
Whoa! Do you see that? It's a treasure box!
Attack a treasure box with your weapon, and it'll crack right open. But don't use a skill or special technique, okay? It'll break!
Duffle and Honeycomb are too much fun! And with Blainchet and Raxa joining, things just keep getting livelier!
Truthfully, I myself am looking forward to hearing more about the journey from ..主人公...
But if you do that, then it takes the fun out of me telling you all I got to hear.
Do not worry, I still love hearing it from you, I just would like to hear it directly from the source from time to time.
I get it. It gets real boring having to sit around here all the time with no one to talk to.
Why so glum? Your last adventure looked like a whole lot of fun!
Sad about not finding the Sword? Or is it because you left your friends behind?
It's not like you abandoned them! We can always go back and see them again. Isn't that good enough?
What matters is we've yet to find the Mana Sword, and we don't need friends to do it.
It must be lonely for you...traveling through echoes and searching for the Mana Sword.
I pondered whether or not to tell you this, but perhaps it is best that you understand.
These friends you have made all existed in the realms that were lost to me.
And now, they only exist in the echoes of the Mana Tree and your memories. But if we can restore this realm as it once was...
...then it means we can restore your friends as well.
Duffle and Honeycomb are too much fun! And with Blainchet and Raxa joining, things just keep getting livelier!
Truthfully, I myself am looking forward to hearing more about the journey from ..主人公...
But if you do that, then it takes the fun out of me telling you all I got to hear.
Do not worry, I still love hearing it from you, I just would like to hear it directly from the source from time to time.
I get it. It gets real boring having to sit around here all the time with no one to talk to.
Why so glum? Your last adventure looked like a whole lot of fun!
Sad about not finding the Sword? Or is it because you left your friends behind?
It's not like you abandoned them! We can always go back and see them again. Isn't that good enough?
What matters is we've yet to find the Mana Sword, and we don't need friends to do it.
It must be lonely for you...traveling through echoes and searching for the Mana Sword.
I pondered whether or not to tell you this, but perhaps it is best that you understand.
These friends you have made all existed in the realms that were lost to me.
And now, they only exist in the echoes of the Mana Tree and your memories. But if we can restore this realm as it once was...
...then it means we can restore your friends as well.
So what you're saying is that if the sword is found, then everyone'll be hunky-dory happily ever after?
Exactly! I know that I can do only what I'm able to do... But that's why I'm hoofing it out there doing all that I can!
Yes, I know very well that you are.
Oh, goddess! I just knew you we watching over me!
It would seem that I have chatted a bit too long. It is a pity, but I am afraid I must take my leave.
Now then, it's about time for us to take our leave as well! The Mana Tree is bearing new fruit! Let's get a move on, shall we?
I know this time we'll get it right!
So what you're saying is that if the sword is found, then everyone'll be hunky-dory happily ever after?
Exactly! I know that I can do only what I'm able to do... But that's why I'm hoofing it out there doing all that I can!
Yes, I know very well that you are.
Oh, goddess! I just knew you we watching over me!
It would seem that I have chatted a bit too long. It is a pity, but I am afraid I must take my leave.
Now then, it's about time for us to take our leave as well! The Mana Tree is bearing new fruit! Let's get a move on, shall we?
I know this time we'll get it right!
This isn't the ground—it's a beast!
L-L-L-Let's not be too hasty here! Easy now, beast!
(I felt like I could see it in my mind... A vision of a myself standing together with my friends.)
Ahhh, a whole new world indeed. Now where are we...
Ah, yes. Judging from our complete lack of surroundings, I daresay we are in the sky!
Oh dear! I forgot you can't fly!
Wait a second... I can't fly eeeitheeer!
Phew! That was close! Good thing the ground is softer than it looks.
The memory of the echo was etched deep into ..主人公...
If there's a certain elemental coin you need, you can play the dungeon where it should drop.
Aw yeah! And that's how you do it!
Now let's see here... There's a fork in the road, but we know Baashear's this way.
We should check that way too, though. There might be more monsters creeping about.
You're right! Better make a clean sweep, so let's take a little detour!
I honestly prefer you treat me just like any other guy. I'm more than just the Mana Sword's Chosen, you know?
I got a thing with Primm and Popoi later... Hey, wanna come with?
What do you do for fun when you're not out there adventuring? I'm lookin' for a hobby so if you got something, let me know.
You wanna know how best to use the mana sword? I mean...I don't think it's the kind of thing you teach. You kinda just...do it?
Heard you're Popoi's newest lacky! Yeah... It's not the kind of thing you can really back out on, so I say just own it.
There was this one time I fell from this real high waterfall. And wouldn't you know it, not a scratch on me. Can you believe that?
Looks like someone's having a good day! Nope, don't even try and hide it! I can see it written all over your face!
I'd be lying if I said I still think about things back home... But in the spirit of being honest, it's a lot more fun being here with you.
There's just something about you, you know. I feel like we have this deep bond. Can't quite explain it, but uh... Aw man, you got me blushing.
I stand here right before your very eyes.
I am the spirit of the Mana Tree, the Mana Goddess.
Perhaps this form is easier for you to understand?
Hehe... Thank goodness. How many ages has it been since I last spoke with a child of man? I cannot recall...
Alas, you must be feeling a bit lost, no?
Is it the form I took? Does it confuse you? Hmm...
Well, you did just awaken, after all. It's natural for one to be a bit out of sorts after what you just went through.
With each passing day, the Mana Tree grows weaker.
All I am able to do now is recollect the memories of those lost worlds through the Mana Tree.
Until all this too, succumbs to eternity.
There is but one way to restore everything. And it lies with you.
Thank you... I had a feeling you would understand.
I am afraid there is no mistake, ..主人公...

..主人公.....
Seek out the Mana Sword. Revive the Mana Tree and save this very universe.
It would seem that I do not have much time left in this form.
So I will entrust you with a doll that possesses my power. May it guide you well...
This is the Sanctuary of Mana. A place where the Mana Tree—the source of all life and worlds—takes root.
It is the last remaining land in this realm.
This place was once abundant with Mana...until it was ruined, and all was lost.
Now then, child of man! My name's Baashear, and I will be shepherding you on your journey.
Never you fret! It's my goddess-given duty to guide you through the unknown!
Yes! And what's wrong with that?
It's my goddess-given duty to guide you through the unknown! Only a sheep has the fluff and tough for your journey!
That's right! Just leave everything to me. I will help you search for the Mana Sword and much more.
Now listen closely, child of man. The Mana Tree is the source of everything.
Its roots are connected to all of time, all the realms, and the memories of all things that inhabit them!
You see, the Mana Sword we seek might be lost from THIS place...
It doesn't mean it's gone from all of them! All we have to do is find the right memory!
So? How does that sound? Got the gist?
Hmm... By the looks of it, I'd say you're still a bit confused. Am I right?
Very well! Why don't you try taking a fruit from the Mana Tree and see for yourself?
Baa hum hum... And this, you see, is how you find the Mana Sword!
We're off on a journey to the inside of a memory!
(Where am I? Was all that...just a dream?)
I am a dragoon and I serve only my master, Vadise.

Wow, it suits you quite well! Be sure to equip gear here as you collect it, okay?
Now then, how about we try upgrading it? You can't go wrong when your gear is strong! That's what humans say, right?

I'm so glad you're all right...

RUN! Run until your legs fall off!

Turn back and run for your lives!

Are you serious!? Sorry, but I don't give up that easy.

..主人公..! This guy is only going after you! And it looks like he's not giving up!
Emergency! Abort mission! We must retreat at once! We're going back to the Mana Sanctuary right now!

Quite an adventure you had, by the looks of it!
Please, do tell me all about it!

Quite an adventure you had, by the looks of it!
Please, do tell me all about it!

Return to me.
To safety in the shade of the Mana Tree...
I guess this is the end.
Hah! Too bad, kiddos. But this is how it usually goes for treasure hunts.

..主人公.. is on a mission from the Mana Goddess, with a lot more riding on this than we do!

Yeah, if the sword is here, I bet it's just up ahead!
Wait, wait, wait. Let's not rush into things.

..主人公..!
We're a team! You can't just go wandering off!

Oh well, better luck next time.

Oof! I said, let's go, ..主人公..!

You WILL be back, right? Let's go on another adventure next time! We'll be waiting for you!

That merchant we just met? I had heard all about his schemes from other travelers, so I just had to intervene.

Say, I was wondering, in your travels have you ever heard about a place where wolfkin like me live?

Dogs sure love their packs, don't they?

Come on, Raxa. Go easy on 'em.

No, it is very much a trap. This is a REAL magic tower built by a REAL mage who didn't WANT to share his loot.

HUMAN! SPIKEY HAIR! ...Can I touch it?

YESSS! THIS IS SOOO...okay I'm over it.

That faerie from the other echo?
